name: Kwame Adebayo
description: Kwame Adebayo is a 70-year-old retired educator, originally from Nigeria, who values thoroughness and careful planning in every aspect of his life. With a cautious nature and a preference for detailed analysis, he seeks to arrange home modifications to ensure both safety and comfort while maintaining his active lifestyle. Although he faces social pressure from family to adapt his living space quickly, he prefers to weigh his options thoughtfully due to his risk-averse personality.
